title: Multifunctioning Graphene Oxide Capping Layer for Highly Efficient and Stable PEDOT:PSS-Silicon Hybrid Solar Cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00889H, Paper
Ruchi K Sharma, Avritti Srivastava, Urvashi Punia, Riya Bansal, Pukhraj Prajapat, Govind Gupta, Sanjay Kumar Srivastava
Organic conjugate polymer, poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT:PSS)/silicon hybrid heterojunction solar cells (HHSCs) have received extensive attention due to their higher efficiency (PCE) and low-temperature processing. However, effective collection of charge carriers from...
